attributes.action: U16 should have completley free travel on trains and buses without having an oyster card
attributes.additional_details: At the moment children 10 and under get free on trains and buses and 11 - 15 s have to pay adult price on buses and trains unless using an 11 - 15 oyster which allows free travel on buses and maximum £1.30 a day which is continually rising. If a u16 forgets their oyster they are expected to pay adult pric or get off the bus and this is not fair children shoukd get free travel without using oysters

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor of London and the Greater London Assembly.
